attributes.action: Review the planning guidance within the UK for mobile telephone mast, to ensure that local authorities have the necessary powers to deal in a correct manner with regards telecom mobile phone mast planning applications.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently telecoms companies have deem rights over planning authorities with regards the location of mast. This petition is aimed to give local authorities and elected members the powers and rights over the sitting and location of mobile phone mast.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
